channel.title: bath on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in bath on Barefoot Rob

item.title: chillin in hot bath
item.description: ##19:37 Thursday 22 January 2015 JST## Outside the Kagoshima airport there’s a hot foot bath, which I enjoyed for a bit over an hour. Jon joined me for a smaller bit over an hour, but a solid hour nonetheless. (I don’t know if I’ve used the word nonetheless before) Afterward, I kept my shoes off, so I’m barefoot on the airplane. Awww yeah so nice.

item.title: chillin in hot bath
item.description: ##19:37 Thursday 22 January 2015 JST## Near the gates, there was a padded area featuring some foam rubber panels which could be linked together. I made a triangular tube and then added a square tube and then realized I could make a short T shape and then realized there were enough pieces to make a tall T shape, and THEN realized that I could get inside.

item.title: Relaxing hot baths
item.description: ##21:11 Saturday 22 November 2014 JST## 大風呂 (hot baths) were nice! I heard Lin and Rohini and I boofed for Lin, but she didn’t hear me. (weird) We’re about to put on warm clothes and head out to the field. ###(written 15:32 Sunday 23 November 2014 JST) Turns out Lin did hear me! She was like, “I hear Rob!” and said Hellooo but Rohini was like, “Rob said he wasn’t coming,” so Lin didn’t pursue it.
